title: Sample Upload Survey
description: This is a sample survey for testing the file upload functionality

welcome.title: Welcome to the Sample Survey
welcome.message: This survey demonstrates the file upload functionality. You can upload custom survey JSON files to test different survey configurations.

thankYou.title: Thank You!
thankYou.message: Thank you for completing the sample survey. Your responses have been recorded.

sections.title: Personal Information
sections.description: Let's start with some basic information about you.

questions.question: What is your full name?
questions.description: Please enter your first and last name

questions.question: What is your current occupation?
questions.description: Optional: Please describe your current job or profession

sections.title: Preferences & Opinions
sections.description: Now let's learn about your preferences and opinions.

questions.question: How satisfied are you with our service?
questions.description: Rate your satisfaction from 1 (very dissatisfied) to 5 (very satisfied)

questions.question: Would you recommend our service to others?
What improvements would you like to see?
questions.description: Please share any suggestions for improvement

sections.title: Additional Feedback
sections.description: We value your feedback. Please share any additional thoughts.

questions.question: How would you rate your overall experience?
Which features do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
Any additional comments or suggestions?
questions.description: Feel free to share any additional thoughts or suggestions
